text: The Langkawi Legend Park is a park in Kuah, Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia. It was built for MYR37 million and officially opened on 27 April 1996. The park was created by reclaiming part of the waterfront in Kuah after two years of construction, based on an idea from Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. ==References== Category:1996 establishments in Asia Category:1990s establishments in Malaysia Category:Parks in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Malaysia Category:Kedah
title: Langkawi Legend Park
